info.name: Start Page | about:home "Hitchhiker" Dark
info.description: You like dark UIs don't you? Yeah you do! :D This one changes the appearance of the Firefox about:home page Also check out these dark themes :) Facebook "HitchHiker" Userstyles "HitchHiker" Youtube "HitchHiker" ZippyShare "HitchHiker" Greasy Fork "HitchHiker" Wikipedia "HitchHiker" FEEL FREE TO SEND IDEAS, SUGGESTIONS AND QUESTIONS TO -> hitchhikerstyle@gmail.com Please comment and give feedback if you like this Style :) it would help me a lot in terms of motivation. Thanks!
